display.title: Giant's Causeway
display.description: This is one of the best know attractions of Ireland. The causeway are basalt column in hexagonal shape that rise from the ocean. It is unbelievable to see such amazing columns and the perfect hexagonal shape.

field.name: Address
field.value: 44 Causeway Rd, Bushmills, Antrim BT57 8SU, United Kingdom
